page.title: 07SPORT
page.content: {Football}is a game that is played a lot in Axbridge.There are 2 teams. There is an under 10's and an under 13's team. The teams are quite good. The boys that play come from all around the area. Most are quite good at football. The thirteens this year won the league and also won a runners up medal in the cup. They play at{Axbridge mushroom farm.}In the cup final they played against{Clevedon. {Clevedon}is a first division side and{ {Axbridge }is a second division side. {Sailing}is a sport that many people enjoy in Axbridge. The sailing centre is{Axbridge reservoir.}There are many types of boat that you can sail on the reservoir. The main precaution that you should take before sailing is to make sure you are wearing a life jacket.If you capsize this device will keep you afloat until rescued.
